item.title: Swati Projects Ltd Forms Death Cross, Signalling Bearish Trend Ahead
item.description: Swati Projects Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Non Banking Financial Company (NBFC) sector, has recently formed a Death Cross as its 50-day moving average (DMA) crossed below the 200-DMA. This technical development signals a potential shift towards a bearish trend, reflecting deteriorating momentum and raising concerns about the stock’s medium to long-term outlook. Time: 21 minutes ago

item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Dec-2025 Results Reveal Mixed Trends Across Market Caps
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has unfolded with a nuanced picture across Indian equities, as 1,351 companies declared results reflecting a cautious improvement in profitability and sales growth. While mid-cap stocks continue to outperform with a 54.0% positive result ratio, large caps lag behind at 36.0%, signalling a divergence in earnings momentum across market capitalisation segments. Time: 21 minutes ago

item.title: Cochin Minerals Q3 FY26: Margin Pressure Intensifies as Revenue Declines
item.description: Cochin Minerals and Rutile Ltd., a specialty chemicals manufacturer focused on titanium-based products, reported a net profit of ₹2.98 crores for Q3 FY26, representing a marginal 1.02% increase quarter-on-quarter but a concerning 40.64% decline year-on-year. The Kerala-based company, with a market capitalisation of ₹216.00 crores, continues to face significant headwinds as revenue contraction and margin compression persist into the third quarter. Time: 36 minutes ago

item.title: Imagicaaworld Entertainment Q3 FY26: Seasonal Weakness Returns, Losses Mount Despite Revenue Uptick
item.description: Imagicaaworld Entertainment Ltd., India's second-largest leisure services company with a market capitalisation of ₹2,810 crores, reported a net loss of ₹5.17 crores for Q3 FY26 (October-December 2025), marking a sharp reversal from the previous quarter's loss of ₹38.91 crores but deteriorating significantly from the ₹3.22 crores profit recorded in Q3 FY25. The company's shares traded at ₹49.14 on February 5, 2026, down 1.36% on the day, reflecting investor concerns over the company's inability to sustain profitability despite sequential revenue improvements. Time: 36 minutes ago

item.title: Unichem Laboratories Q3 FY26: Exceptional Gain Masks Operational Struggles
item.description: Unichem Laboratories Ltd., the Mumbai-based pharmaceutical manufacturer with a market capitalisation of ₹2,926 crores, reported a staggering net profit of ₹264.29 crores for Q3 FY26 (October-December 2025), representing an extraordinary 356.85% year-on-year surge. However, this headline-grabbing figure conceals a troubling operational reality: the company's core business continues to struggle with declining margins and shrinking profitability, whilst the reported profit stems primarily from a one-time exceptional gain rather than sustainable business performance. Time: 36 minutes ago

item.title: FDC Ltd Q3 FY26: Profit Margins Crumble as Other Income Props Up Bottom Line
item.description: FDC Ltd., the Mumbai-based pharmaceutical company specialising in formulations and active pharmaceutical ingredients, delivered a disappointing Q3 FY26 performance, with net profit declining 23.60% year-on-year to ₹28.30 crores despite relatively flat revenue growth. The stock has plunged 28.90% from its 52-week high of ₹528.30, currently trading at ₹375.60 with a market capitalisation of ₹6,202 crores, reflecting mounting investor concerns over deteriorating operational efficiency and margin compression. Time: 36 minutes ago

item.title: R M Drip & Sprinklers Systems Ltd Hits New 52-Week High at Rs.110.4
item.description: R M Drip & Sprinklers Systems Ltd has reached a significant milestone by hitting a new 52-week high of Rs.110.4 today, marking a notable surge in its stock price and reflecting sustained positive momentum over recent trading sessions. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Xchanging Solutions Ltd Reports Flat Quarterly Performance Amid Margin Pressures
item.description: Xchanging Solutions Ltd, a player in the Computers - Software & Consulting sector, has reported a flat financial performance for the quarter ended December 2025, marking a notable shift from its previously positive growth trajectory. The company’s latest quarterly results reveal a contraction in profitability and earnings per share, signalling challenges in sustaining margin expansion despite a robust return on capital employed in the half-year period. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: AWFIS Space Solutions Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Continued Underperformance
item.description: AWFIS Space Solutions Ltd witnessed a significant decline today, hitting a new 52-week low of Rs.370.6. This marks a notable downturn for the diversified commercial services company, reflecting ongoing pressures in its stock performance despite broader market movements. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Samrat Forgings Ltd Stock Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs.182.2 Amidst Continued Downtrend
item.description: Samrat Forgings Ltd’s shares declined sharply to a fresh 52-week low of Rs.182.2 on 5 Feb 2026, marking a significant drop of 8.99% on the day and underperforming its sector by 8.26%. This new low reflects ongoing pressures on the stock, which has now fallen nearly 48% over the past year, contrasting with the Sensex’s 6.44% gain during the same period. Time: 2 hours ago
